name: HTML5 Flash Video Fallback
short_description: There are many alledged and real solutions to extend HTML5 documents with Flash Video capabilities. The sample code will present on how you can make the HTML5 video tag work on browser installations only supporting Flash Video. Besides this we will discuss alternative solutions with Java and the no-more-free Flowplayer. Simply reading out all video tags and then to insert embed tags for Flash Video by DOM/ Javascript is an alluringly simple and efficient solution attempt; sole disadvantage: We will have to provide a third format in addition to .webm and .mp4: .swf or Shockwave Flash. The mwEmbed library on the other hand allows direct playback of .ogg videos which is another HTML5 format.
summary: embed videos to be shown by Flash with the HTML5 video tag
